definition: to be defeated/to lose/to fail (e.g. experiments)/failure/defeat/CL:次[ci4]
to defeat/to damage/to lose (to an opponent)/to fail/to wither
Failure is the mother of success.
pinyin: shi1 bai4 shi4 cheng2 gong1 zhi1 mu3

definition: to succeed through failure/to achieve one's final aim despite apparent setback
pinyin: yi3 shi1 bai4 er2 gao4 zhong1

definition: to fail at every step of the way (idiom)

sentences.english: But it was this sense of failure that made him determined to succeed in his new life.
sentences.chinese: 但就是這種失敗感使他決心在新的生活中取得成功。

sentences.english: He ascribed his failure to objective conditions.
sentences.chinese: 他把失敗歸咎於客觀條件。

sentences.english: The second failing is an ironic flipside of success.
sentences.chinese: 第二個失敗則是對歐元成功的諷刺。

sentences.english: If you give an option of failure deep within yourself, you will fail.
sentences.chinese: 如果你內心深處給了自己失敗的選項，你將會失敗。

sentences.english: If you give an option of failure deep within yourself, you will fail.
sentences.chinese: 如果你內心深處給了自己失敗的選項，你將會失敗。

sentences.english: Memory allocation failures should reduce the use of this flag.
sentences.chinese: 如果內存分配失敗過多，應該減少這個標記的使用。

sentences.english: Registratie ongedaan maken van de User Account Control Support Library is mislukt.
sentences.chinese: 取消用戶賬戶支持運行庫失敗。

sentences.english: Youll fail or go crazy for sure.
RemoteException - Thrown when the method failed due to a system-level failure.
sentences.chinese: 方法拋出該異常表示一個由系統級錯誤引起的失敗。

sentences.english: Lyon claim that Chelsea's attempts to sign midfielder Michael Essien have all but collapsed.
sentences.chinese: 里昂宣稱切爾西試圖簽下中場埃辛的事情以失敗告終。

sentences.english: A section of defeat's sentiment most abstains from is, never forgets.
sentences.chinese: 壹段失敗的感情最忌諱的便是，念念不忘。

sentences.english: It's ethnocentrism that leads to failure in international business.
sentences.chinese: 它的種族優越感從而導致其在國際貿易的失敗。

sentences.english: Rule No.8: Your school may have done away with winners and losers.
sentences.chinese: 在你的學校也許不存在勝利與失敗，但生活中存在。

sentences.english: The deal fell through with Wayan.
We are sorry to hear about your business.
sentences.chinese: 聽到你生意失敗的消息，我們深表遺憾。

sentences.english: Courage is going from failure to failure with-out losing enthusiasm.
sentences.chinese: 勇氣就是不斷失敗，而熱情仍在。

definition: outcome/result/conclusion/in the end/as a result/to kill/to dispatch
to defeat/to damage/to lose (to an opponent)/to fail/to wither
once/already/former/previously/ever/(past tense marker used before verb or clause)
to admit/to concede/to recognize/recognition (diplomatic, artistic etc)/to acknowledge
